name: Christmas Scratch Game Jam
description:
~~Hi people!~~

This is made with Turbowarp!

Hi people! Welcome to my page... This is the first ever game jam I joined! Hope you like the game!!! I wanted to add more things/content but then I had no time so I have added some other features!

The things I didnt add were:

Houses, NPC,  Shops,  Insides of buildings, lore, a dungeon ect... Hope that they will come in the future!

Note to creators!

I have used some game assets from people! I have downloaded so much that I can't remember what I did and did not use... Sorry for that! If you see that I used your asset pack, feel free to link that!

Hope you enjoy the game
